    • Rates and Discount Factors

Inherits from ZeroCurve

Checks whether object inherits from ZeroCurve class

is.ZeroCurve(x)

Arguments

x

an R object

Value

TRUE if x inherits from the ZeroCurve class; otherwise FALSE

Examples

zc_df <- fmdata_example("zerocurve.csv")
#> Error in fmdata_example("zerocurve.csv"): could not find function "fmdata_example"
values <- zc_df[["dfs"]]
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'zc_df' not found
starts <- as.Date(as.character(zc_df[["start"]]), "%Y%m%d")
#> Error in as.Date(as.character(zc_df[["start"]]), "%Y%m%d"): object 'zc_df' not found
ends <- as.Date(as.character(zc_df[["end"]]), "%Y%m%d")
#> Error in as.Date(as.character(zc_df[["end"]]), "%Y%m%d"): object 'zc_df' not found
dfs <- DiscountFactor(values, starts, ends)
#> Error in NROW(value): object 'values' not found
zc <- ZeroCurve(dfs, starts[1], LogDFInterpolation())
#> Error in lubridate::as_date(date1): object 'starts' not found
is.ZeroCurve(zc)
#> Error in inherits(x, "ZeroCurve"): object 'zc' not found
